## Source: amazon-inspector (a096b32dfa76f7e64480d72862c34ec7e644ac03db51ad09af0eb1f929d637a1)
The package corporate-blocking was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (fc6d759e06456e2ac7013ed6a7a36afea9e7a21ab6dc117937c5dd0d96b8d993)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'corporate-blocking' @ 2.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
